comments:
I had a couple of these in my log file. should these be reported to the user
instead?

	at

	at

	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)

These errors should not be reproted to the user. The UI updates asynchronously 
with the debugger - so when we attempted to draw a thread, the thread had 
already been garbage collected (not interesting to the user). We have put some 
work in place to avoid logging this information, but there are cases where it 
will still happen.

To avoid logging these errors - we should simply return a temporary name for 
the thread, rather than throwing an exception. The thread should momentarily 
disappear from the view anyway.
